version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - two additional color schemes - adjustable backgrounds in TCP/MCP - adjuster presets - adjuster quick layout switch - adjustable TCP label brightness - clearly rounded items - left orientation for TCP folder/longname states

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - re-designed folders and longname layouts to be more consistant - fixed issues with colors for disabled sends and stretch markers - increased range for TCP label color (unselected) - improved behavior in longname layouts - added two color variations - solid item backgrounds for bright and grey themes (experimental) - some refactoring stuff

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - overall improvements for TCP collapsing behavior - small bug fixes - small changes in TCP meter behavior - hidden feature for geeks

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - overall improvements for TCP collapsing behavior - small bug fixes - small changes in TCP meter behavior - hidden feature for geeks

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - upgraded envelope panel - track color strip with color picker - envelope type indicator (basic/FX parameter) - Transport improvements - revealed dock/undock button - adjuster button placed below dock button to be more compact - introduced quick tools for transport panel - changed behavior in floating state - center position is really centered now for any screen size

version.author: Dmytry Hapochka
version.changelog: - TCP solid color layout changed again. - some panels and buttons in dark versions are becoming darker. fixed issue with “bright meter” on “sidemeter” adjuster positions

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - new TCP behavior when FX or send lists are not visible - longname 2 layout removed - longname layout is fixed and fit new logic - little design changes

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - new TCP behavior when FX or send lists are not visible - improved meter and TCP elements behavior on collapsing - whole new envelope panel - added TCP elements for triggering fixed lanes (_dev only) - TCP backgrounds becomes bit brighter - some re-factoring stuff - some bugs fixed - some bugs added

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - Advanced Tools For Fixed Lanes - Toggle Mcp Folder Padding - Availability To Set Color From Tcp And Mcp - Redesigned Layouts - Brand new custom theme adjuster - Unmute/unsolo all from transport panel - Fast access to theme adjuster from transport - Fast switch between docked and floating transport - Disabling folder State from MCP - More smooth collapsing behavior - 4 color schemes

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - Advanced Tools For Fixed Lanes - Toggle Mcp Folder Padding - Availability To Set Color From Tcp And Mcp - Redesigned Layouts - Brand new custom theme adjuster - Unmute/unsolo all from transport panel - Fast access to theme adjuster from transport - Fast switch between docked and floating transport - Disabling folder State from MCP - More smooth collapsing behavior - 4 color schemes

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: Fixed bug of wrong view when FX was disabled in TCP

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - fixed small bugs in longname TCP layout - changed behavior for TCP folders when option “record stuff in folders” is enabled - fixed wrong meter size with meterbridge position in TCP for longname layouts and folders - darken meter background in MCP meterbridge layout - re-designed routing button in MCP meterbridge layout - added colored background for track name in MCP meterbridge layout, and letters become brighter. - MCP meterbridge layout is now obeying “solid background” option in adjuster

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - improved alignment behavior when "align TCP controls when track icons or fixed lanes are used" - fixed wrong track name alignment in TCP "longname" layout - improved TCP FX list behavior: now, there are two scenarios, when the FX list will be shown under the volume column: - if there is not enough panel width to contain the FX list - when the option "show Embedded UI of plugins instead of FX list" is enabled (see screenshots) - new color scheme for items in arrange view (dark and black themes only) - new color scheme for TCP in dark and black themes - fixed some minor issues with everything - default MCP layout was a bit re-designed

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - improved TCP meter behavior, especially for «meterbridge» conditions including collapsing etc - when TCP «Meterbridge» is enabled, FX list will appear in «compact mode» (as well as it goes with «embedded UI instead FX list») - fixed some small visual inconsistencies across TCP

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - fixed bug when FX List disappears in colored fader TCP layouts

version.author: Dmytro Hapochka
version.changelog: - two additional color schemes - adjustable backgrounds in TCP/MCP - adjuster presets - adjuster quick layout switch - adjustable TCP label brightness - clearly rounded items - left orientation for TCP folder/longname states
